definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Then the 'world's largest pothole' was transformed into one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 然后，“世界上最大的洞穴”变成了世界奇观之一。

sentences.english: We were completely amazed at the wonder and the greatness of nature.
sentences.chinese: 这一奇观和大自然的伟大使我们完全惊愕了。

sentences.english: The Great Wall of China is one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国的万里长城是世界奇观之一。

sentences.english: When the frost coverage, we see, "Fireworks" spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 当霜雪覆盖时，又见“火树银花”奇观。

sentences.english: They starred together in the big-screen spectacle Cleopatra, released in 1963.
sentences.chinese: 他们主演的大屏幕奇观克娄巴特拉在1963。

sentences.english: They walked into Dingling and were surprised at the wonders.
sentences.chinese: 他们走进定陵，对那里的奇观感到很惊奇。

sentences.english: We've had tens of thousands that will call us a wonder of the world.
sentences.chinese: 数以万计的人都称这里是世界奇观。

sentences.english: The Buddhist cliff carvings on Kongwang Mountain are regarded as one the world's cultural wonders.
sentences.chinese: 孔望山佛教摩崖造像群堪称世界文化的奇观。

sentences.english: It is a world of never-ending wonders.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个世界的永无休止的奇观。

sentences.english: Eighteen Arhats, is one of Xiushan geological wonders.
sentences.chinese: 十八罗汉，是秀山地质奇观之一。

sentences.english: Red glow burrow is another marvellous spectacle of Tai Ning.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞洞穴是泰宁的另一奇观。

sentences.english: Most part of China can observe this wonderful event.
sentences.chinese: 中国大部分地区可观看到这个天象奇观。

sentences.english: New Governments, and wonders which give you free advances also help alot.
sentences.chinese: 新的政体，奇观也能给你的文明的发展带来很多好处。

sentences.english: I'm very happy to meet you here in this land of wonder .
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴在这个充满奇观的国家与宁您见面。

sentences.english: A leaf is a beautiful thing. It is also a wonder of chemical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 一片树叶是如此美丽，它是化学工程的奇观。

sentences.english: Please everyone get off with me into this beautiful song wonders fog.
sentences.chinese: 请大家随我下车，走进这美丽的雾凇奇观。

definition: in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
supernaturally fine craft (idiom); the work of the Gods/uncanny workmanship/superlative craftsmanship
